text: hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with raw green sauce commonly
referred to as salsa verde this
incredibly primitive ancient rustic
sauce could be just what you're looking
for for those grilled meats this summer
because you're tired of all the stuff

years and he wants up new so this is
something new so the secret to this
recipe is the grinding tools this is a
molcajete which is basically a coarse
stone mortar and pestle of course you
can use a regular mortar and pestle
doesn't matter as long as you can crush
stuff and grind it it will work so we're
going to toss in two large cloves of
garlic and I'm going to start smashing
that so you've seen this trick before
once we start to smash it throw in a
pinch of coarse salt kosher salt that
will help grind the garlic when it gets
to that texture I'm going to add my
capers and my anchovy paste which could
also be regular anchovies once that's
ground down I throw in my fresh Italian

incredibly small I don't know if it's
freakishly small but an incredibly small
MOCA head day here this is like a
one-hitter if you can get one of the big
ones get one of the big ones but it
works it works for me
this is just for me and my wife Michelle
so I don't need a big one and you're
going to notice I'm going to leave this
pretty coarse okay I don't want to grind
this down to a super fine paste or puree
I want this to be very kind of rustic
alright once that's ground up I'm going
to add some vinegar and some oil and
that's it unbelievably simple you do not
get flavor like this using conventional
methods like a Cuisinart because you're
crushing all the ingredients and things
happen that just doesn't happen to
pureed food in a food processor so get
one of these MOCAD days or one of those
just regular old mortar pestle zin the
store and make this raw green sauce this
is magically delicious on any kind of
grilled meat just a great combination
the briny capers the salty anchovy the
freshness of the year of the the sharp
burn of the raw garlic just incredible
incredible combination I hope you give
this simple simple recipe try perfect
